amendment.description: To amend chapter 2 of title 1, United States Code, to create requirements for calling an Article V Convention, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 5765 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 5765 proposed by Senator Braun to Amendment SA 5745. (consideration: CR S5518-5519; text: CR S5518-5519) To amend chapter 2 of title 1, United States Code, to create requirements for calling an Article V Convention, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5765 proposed by Senator Braun to Amendment SA 5745.
